data.oai_dc:dc: Aux. table - Measurement scales of EO sensors for measuring biodiversity patterns

Satellite Earth observation (EO) sensors used to measure biodiversity patterns according to the Essential Biodiversity Variables framework (EBV, Pereira et al. 2013). These data were used to create the figures in the associated manuscript, and highlight which sensors have been used to measure specific patterns. These figures do not to provide a comprehensive review of all patterns measured by each sensor, in each case, the most cited or most novel studies were selected.
